{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = 1933 hi res.png |image1_size = 300px |caption = Wireless AC1200 LTE6 Gigabit Access Point/Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://mikrotik.com/product/hap_ac3_lte6_kit |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = MikroTik |model = RouterBOARD hAP |submodelappend = yes |submodel = ac 3 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RBD53GR-5HacD2HnD &R11e-LTE6 |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TV7RDB53-5ACD2ND, TV7R11ELTE6 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4019; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 716 <!-- 716 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128JVSM;W25Q128JVSM, (W25Q128FVSIG); |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = CC:2D:E0, |oui = CC:2D:E0,
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RouterBOOT;;; |stockos = RouterOS;L4;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, SIM Card slot |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = 24 |pwr_poe_amp = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, SIM Card slot, LTE modem, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.88.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/08/2020 |estreldate = 04/29/2020 |estprice = 219 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Latvia
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MikroTik", "D53GR-5HacD2HnD" and "hAP ac3 series" :is silkscreened on the board. 27dBm power, 3/5.5 dBi integrated Wi-Fi antennas {{see also|MikroTik}}
*[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ac 3 LTE6 (RBD53GR-5HacD2HnD &R11e-LTE6)]] :[https://mikrotik.com/product/hap_ac3_lte6_kit RBD53GR-5HacD2HnD&R11e-LTE6] ('''hAP ac3 LTE6 kit''') :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RDB53-5ACD2ND TV7RDB53-5ACD2ND] (2020-04-08) <small>''(Data is missing)''</small> :5x GbE ports, USB 2.0, Wave 2 (2x2 2.4/5GHz) • [https://i.mt.lv/cdn/rb_files/hAP_ac3__LTE6_kit-1588058298.pdf PBrief] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 @716MHz, 16/256MB • Cat6 LTE
*[[MikroTik R11e-LTE6]] • LTE Mini PCIe Card R11e-LTE6 :FCC ID: TV7R11ELT6L (2019-06-28) • TV711ELTE6 (2019-03-06) {{FCC ST|07/11/2018|indexme.}}
